main event: On December 18, 1956, two balls of light were reported in the sky over Biloxi, Mississippi.
interesting points: The balls of light were described as cream to white in color and half dollar size,The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds and occurred at dusk,The objects were observed stationary and emitted a sound similar to a jet engine,The report indicates that the objects might possibly be balloons or aircraft, with insufficient data for definitive evaluation,The civilian pilot who reported the sighting was 49 years old and from Louisiana.
witness description: civilian pilot from Louisiana, 49 years old
